price: 61. (Quienes tenían más poder) dijeron: «Traedlo ante la gente para que sean testigos (en su contra)».
arabic: قَالُواْ فَأۡتُواْ بِهِۦ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِ ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَشۡهَدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū fatū bihi ʿalā aʿyuni al-nāsi laʿallahum yashhadūna
